featured.title: 3D LIDAR Scanner
featured.description: Developed a 3D Spatial Mapper using a ToF sensor and stepper motor, enabling real-time indoor environment mapping with 360Â° rotation and data visualization via Python.

featured.title: 'Snake' Game Replica
featured.description: Replicated the famous 'Snake'  on the command line terminal console using C++. Utilized various data structures & algorithms to maximize game efficiency.

featured.title: Task Scheduler
featured.description: Developed a task scheduler with context switching on STM32, enabling efficient multi-tasking with precise LED control and round-robin task management.
